BJCHI-R.BK.long_name: BJC Heavy Industries Public Company Limited
BJCHI-R.BK.summary: BJC Heavy Industries Public Company Limited manufactures and sells fabricated steel and equipment, and provides modularization services in Thailand and internationally. It fabricates steel into various steel structures by cutting, bending, welding, and assembling structural steel, pipes, and components based on client design and specifications; executes large-scale modularization projects; builds steel structures for mines, power plants, and industrial plants; and manufactures a range of precast concrete products, including breakwater and port construction materials, railway sleepers, pre-stressed concrete panels, and large files for use in the construction of harbors, bridges, and railways. The company also provides built-up beams, as well as grating, galvanizing, and post-weld heat treatment services. It serves oil and gas, petrochemical, refining, mining, renewable energy, power, and other industries. BJC Heavy Industries Public Company Limited was incorporated in 1994 and is headquartered in Rayong, Thailand.

BJCHI.BK.long_name: BJC Heavy Industries Public Company Limited

CAZ-R.BK.summary: CAZ (Thailand) Public Company Limited provides construction-related services to petrochemical plants, oil refinery projects, power plant projects, and infrastructure projects in Thailand. It offers engineering, procurement, and construction services in the areas of civil work, building work, production and fabrication work of steel structure, piping work, mechanical work, electrical and instrument work, and scaffolding and painting work. The company also undertakes structure erection, piping fabrication and erection, equipment erection, and electric and instrument works, including pre-commissioning and commissioning; and civil and building construction works, including engineering works. In addition, it is involved in mechanical fabrication works, including structures, vessels, heat exchangers, and tanks. The company was founded in 2014 and is based in Rayong, Thailand.

CAZ.BK.summary: CAZ (Thailand) Public Company Limited provides construction-related services to petrochemical plants, oil refinery projects, power plant projects, and infrastructure projects in Thailand. It offers engineering, procurement, and construction services in the areas of civil work, building work, production and fabrication work of steel structure, piping work, mechanical work, electrical and instrument work, and scaffolding and painting work. The company also undertakes structure erection, piping fabrication and erection, equipment erection, and electric and instrument works, including pre-commissioning and commissioning; and civil and building construction works, including engineering works. In addition, it is involved in mechanical fabrication works, including structures, vessels, heat exchangers, and tanks. The company was incorporated in 2014 and is headquartered in Rayong, Thailand.

CK-R.BK.summary: CH. Karnchang Public Company Limited, together with its subsidiaries, provides construction services in Thailand and the Lao People's Democratic Republic. The company offers engineering and construction services for infrastructure construction work, including roads, bridges, elevated roads, expressways, and building and industrial factory construction work, as well as mechanical and electrical equipment work comprising installation of equipment and machinery for various factories, etc.; and mass rapid transit systems, airports, and water supply and harbors. It also invests in infrastructure projects; sells construction materials; and rents construction equipment. The company serves government agencies, state enterprises, and private entities. CH. Karnchang Public Company Limited was incorporated in 1972 and is headquartered in Bangkok, Thailand.

CK.BK.summary: CH. Karnchang Public Company Limited, together with its subsidiaries, provides construction services in Thailand and the Lao People's Democratic Republic. The company offers engineering and construction services for infrastructure construction work, including roads, bridges, elevated roads, expressways, and building and industrial factory construction work, as well as mechanical and electrical equipment work comprising installation of equipment and machinery for various factories, etc.; and mass rapid transit systems, airports, and water supply and harbors. It also invests in infrastructure projects; sells construction materials; and rents construction equipment. The company serves government agencies, state enterprises, and private entities. CH. Karnchang Public Company Limited was incorporated in 1972 and is headquartered in Bangkok, Thailand.

CNT-R.BK.summary: Christiani & Nielsen (Thai) Public Company Limited, together with its subsidiaries, provides construction services for government and private sectors in Thailand and internationally. The company engages in the design and construction of building and civil engineering projects; and design, fabrication, and erection of steel structures, and mechanical and electrical installations. It also provides services for energy solutions in solar, wind, and other renewable energy sectors; and develops properties. The company was formerly known as Christiani & Nielsen (Siam) Ltd. and changed its name to Christiani & Nielsen (Thai) Public Company Limited in November 1992. The company was founded in 1930 and is headquartered in Bangkok, Thailand. Christiani & Nielsen (Thai) Public Company Limited is a subsidiary of Globex Corporation Limited.

CNT.BK.summary: Christiani & Nielsen (Thai) Public Company Limited, together with its subsidiaries, provides construction services for government and private sectors in Thailand and internationally. The company engages in the design and construction of building and civil engineering projects; and design, fabrication, and erection of steel structures, and mechanical and electrical installations. It also provides services for energy solutions in solar, wind, and other renewable energy sectors; and develops properties. The company was founded in 1930 and is headquartered in Bangkok, Thailand. Christiani & Nielsen (Thai) Public Company Limited is a subsidiary of Globex Corporation Limited.

CRD-R.BK.summary: Chiangmai Rimdoi Public Company Limited provides construction services in Thailand. It also offers solid waste disposal services. The company was founded in 1990 and is based in Chiang Mai, Thailand.

CRD.BK.summary: Chiangmai Rimdoi Public Company Limited provides construction services in Thailand. It also offers solid waste disposal services. The company was founded in 1990 and is based in Chiang Mai, Thailand.

DEMCO-R.BK.summary: Demco Public Company Limited, together with its subsidiaries, engages in the provision of electric system construction and service works in the fields of electric and telecommunication engineering in Thailand. The company operates through six segments: Sales, Electricity from Solar Power, Electrical Work Services, Mechanical Work Services, Engagement Work Services, and Other Services. The Sales segment produces and sells steel structure fabrications for electrical and telecommunication works, as well as offers tap water. The Electricity from Solar Power segment generates and sells electricity from solar power. The Electrical Work Services segment designs, constructs, and manages electrical work. The Mechanical Work Services segment designs, constructs, and manages mechanical and electric systems and facilities, such as electrical, water management, air-conditioning and ventilation, and steam and hot water systems. The Engagement Work Services segment produces and installs fabricated steel structures and high pressure vessels. The Other Services segment provides civil work, communication, and other services. It also manufactures and trades in steel structures and steel towers; and trades in assembled telecommunication equipment, communication equipment, and electrical equipment, as well as sells construction materials. Demco Public Company Limited was founded in 1992 and is headquartered in Pathum Thani, Thailand.

DEMCO.BK.summary: Demco Public Company Limited, together with its subsidiaries, engages in the provision of electric system construction and service works in the fields of electric and telecommunication engineering in Thailand. The company operates through six segments: Sales, Electricity from Solar Power, Electrical Work Services, Mechanical Work Services, Engagement Work Services, and Other Services. The Sales segment produces and sells steel structure fabrications for electrical and telecommunication works, as well as offers tap water. The Electricity from Solar Power segment generates and sells electricity from solar power. The Electrical Work Services segment designs, constructs, and manages electrical work. The Mechanical Work Services segment designs, constructs, and manages mechanical and electric systems and facilities, such as electrical, water management, air-conditioning and ventilation, and steam and hot water systems. The Engagement Work Services segment produces and installs fabricated steel structures and high pressure vessels. The Other Services segment provides civil work, communication, and other services. It also manufactures and trades in steel structures and steel towers; and trades in assembled telecommunication equipment, communication equipment, and electrical equipment, as well as sells construction materials. Demco Public Company Limited was founded in 1992 and is headquartered in Pathum Thani, Thailand.

EMC.BK.summary: EMC Public Company Limited, together with its subsidiaries, engages in the construction contracting and real estate development businesses in Hong Kong. It offers construction for skyscrapers and other industrial buildings; and barrage construction, waterway construction, soil destruction prevention, roadway construction, etc. The company also provides electrical and mechanical engineering services, such as installation of electrical systems, plumbing systems, and ventilation systems for hotels, hospitals, condominiums, offices, shopping malls, and industrial factories. In addition, it develops various projects, including single house, town house, commercial buildings, department stores, condominium, etc. The company was formerly known as EMC Engineering Limited Partnership. EMC Public Company Limited was incorporated in 1979 and is headquartered in Bangkok, Thailand.

FLOYD-R.BK.summary: Floyd Public Company Limited engages in the installation of utility and fire suppression systems in Thailand. It offers services in the areas of mains distribution, UPS, generators, general lighting and power, architectural lighting, HVAC, BMS, plumbing, gas systems, fire alarms, data and telecoms, MATV and CCTV, access control, and security systems. The company was founded in 1988 and is headquartered in Nonthaburi, Thailand.

FLOYD.BK.summary: Floyd Public Company Limited engages in the installation of utility and fire suppression systems in Thailand. It offers services in the areas of mains distribution, UPS, generators, general lighting and power, architectural lighting, HVAC, BMS, plumbing, gas systems, fire alarms, data and telecoms, MATV and CCTV, access control, and security systems. The company was founded in 1988 and is headquartered in Nonthaburi, Thailand.

HYDRO-R.BK.summary: Hydrotek Public Company Limited, together with its subsidiaries, engages in the investment in, construction, and management of environmental engineering business in Thailand. It is involved in the engineering, procurement, construction, installation, operation, and maintenance of water treatment plants, such as portable water, desalination, and demineralization plants; wastewater recycle and wastewater treatment plants; solid waste treatment plants for sanitary landfills, secure landfills, production of refuse derived fuel, and mechanical and biological treatment for municipal waste management system; and biological wastewater treatment plants to treat wastewater and solid waste from industrial, agriculture, and community. The company was founded in 1982 and is headquartered in Bangkok, Thailand.

HYDRO.BK.summary: Hydrotek Public Company Limited, together with its subsidiaries, engages in the investment in, construction, and management of environmental engineering business in Thailand. It is involved in the engineering, procurement, construction, installation, operation, and maintenance of water treatment plants, such as portable water, desalination, and demineralization plants; wastewater recycle and wastewater treatment plants; solid waste treatment plants for sanitary landfills, secure landfills, production of refuse derived fuel, and mechanical and biological treatment for municipal waste management system; and biological wastewater treatment plants to treat wastewater and solid waste from industrial, agriculture, and community. The company was founded in 1982 and is headquartered in Bangkok, Thailand.

IND.BK.long_name: Index International Group Public Company Limited
IND.BK.summary: Index International Group Public Company Limited operates as an engineering consultancy company in Thailand. The company provides a range of services in specialized fields, such as project planning; city and district planning; architectural design involving landscaping and architecture; and engineering design involving structural, electrical, mechanical, transportation, sanitary, geotechnical, environmental, and water resources engineering. Its services also comprise master planning in the fields of site reconnaissance and survey, socio-economic survey and analysis, and feasibility analysis; and complete design and engineering services for construction and contract bidding, such as preliminary engineering design, detailed engineering design, scale models when required, specification and drawings, bills of quantities, other technical description required for procurement and construction, and geographic information system. In addition, the company offers project management/construction supervision and designÂbuild services. Index International Group Public Company Limited was founded in 1983 and is based in Pathumthani, Thailand.

ITD.BK.summary: Italian-Thai Development Public Company Limited, together with its subsidiaries, engages in the civil, and infrastructure construction and development businesses in Thailand, India, Bangladesh, and internationally. The company undertakes various construction projects, including office buildings, condominiums, skyscrapers, and hotels, as well as industrial plants; and pipeline and utility works, such as oil, gas, and water transmission pipelines, as well as conduit and manhole systems, and storage tanks. It also undertakes highway, railway, high speed rail, viaduct, track work, MRT system, bridge, and expressway projects; airports, ports, and marine works; dams, tunnels, and power plants; and steel structure, telecommunications, and mining projects. In addition, the company offers coal digestion, and foundation and piling work services; manufactures and distributes cement, as well as steel pipes for civil construction; produces and distributes electricity; and holds concession for constructing elevated expressway, as well as deep sea port and railway in Mozambique. Further, it is involved in rock quarrying, processing, and distribution activities; manufacturing, distribution, and installation of concrete panels and concrete products for real estate; production and sale of vessels and equipment; real estate development activities. Additionally, the company engages in the construction of track doubling project; an airport terminal in India; underground electrical train station in Taiwan; and airfield pavement, as well as acts as a contractor for the overburden and lignite removal services. Italian-Thai Development Public Company Limited was incorporated in 1958 and is headquartered in Bangkok, Thailand.

JR-R.BK.summary: J.R.W. Utility Public Company Limited engages in the design, procurement, construction, and installation of electrical power and telecommunication, and information technology systems. It is involved in high voltage transmission line system construction; high voltage substation construction and equipment installation; construction for changing the electrical cable to the underground systems; and infrastructure system planning, core network system, software and application system construction, and system implementation of other equipment activities. The company also maintains, repairs, and sells electrical system equipment, and telecommunication and information technology systems. The company was incorporated in 1993 and is headquartered in Bangkok, Thailand.

JR.BK.summary: J.R.W. Utility Public Company Limited engages in the design, procurement, construction, and installation of electrical power and telecommunication, and information technology systems. It is involved in high voltage transmission line system construction; high voltage substation construction and equipment installation; construction for changing the electrical cable to the underground systems; and infrastructure system planning, core network system, software and application system construction, and system implementation of other equipment activities. The company also maintains, repairs, and sells electrical system equipment, and telecommunication and information technology systems. The company was incorporated in 1993 and is headquartered in Bangkok, Thailand.

NWR-R.BK.summary: Nawarat Patanakarn Public Company Limited provides construction contracting services to the government agencies, state enterprises, and private sectors in Thailand. The company operates through three segments: Construction Contracting Business; Real Estate Development Business; and Manufacture of Concrete Product Business. It undertakes various construction contracting works, including buildings, industrial plants, infrastructure and public works, ports, berths and jetties, power plants, electricity generating reservoirs, and wastewater treatment systems and plants. The company also supplies pre-stressed concrete piles, pre-stressed concrete girders, and precast concrete pipes for the construction of wastewater treatment projects; parapets; and concrete pre-cast slabs and sheet piles to protect from land subsidence, as well as manufactures and sells fabricated steel products, and operates petrol station under Shell name. In addition, it is involved in the water and wastewater utility management, construction consulting, property development, and restaurant and processed food businesses. Nawarat Patanakarn Public Company Limited was founded in 1976 and is headquartered in Bang Phli, Thailand.

NWR.BK.summary: Nawarat Patanakarn Public Company Limited provides construction contracting services to the government agencies, state enterprises, and private sectors in Thailand. In addition, it is involved in the water and wastewater utility management, construction consulting, property development, and restaurant and processed food businesses. Nawarat Patanakarn Public Company Limited was founded in 1976 and is headquartered in Bang Phli, Thailand.

NYVK.F.long_name: Sino-Thai Engineering and Construction Public Company Limited
NYVK.F.summary: Sino-Thai Engineering and Construction Public Company Limited, together with its subsidiaries, provides construction services in Thailand. It is involved in the construction of infrastructure development projects, including mass transit transportations, elevated roads, highways, roads, bridges, dams, jetty work, and other projects. The company also constructs industrial projects consisting of factories and chemical plants; building projects comprising office buildings, condominiums, housing projects, resorts, hangers, stadiums, convention centers, museums, hospitals, schools, and airport terminals; and power, gas, and energy projects, as well as environmental projects, such as oil wastewater treatment plants. In addition, it is involved in the rental of office buildings, machinery, and construction equipment; provision of document storage services; development of real estate projects; and electricity generation activities. The company was founded in 1962 and is based in Bangkok, Thailand.

PLE.BK.long_name: Power Line Engineering Public Company Limited
PLE.BK.summary: Power Line Engineering Public Company Limited, together with its subsidiaries, engages in the design, engineering, and installation of mechanical and electrical systems for private and government sectors in Thailand and internationally. It operates through System Installation and Construction, and Real Estate Development segments. The company is also involved in the installation of telecommunication, air conditioning, sanitary and plumbing, and fire protection systems; and civil construction operations in the areas of super structures, reinforced concrete roads, diaphragm and curtain walls, and tunneling and site drainage facilities. Power Line Engineering Public Company Limited was founded in 1988 and is headquartered in Bangkok, Thailand.

PPS-R.BK.long_name: Project Planning Service Public Company Limited
PPS-R.BK.summary: Project Planning Service Public Company Limited provides engineering and architectural services to the private and public sectors in Thailand and internationally. The company offers various project management/construction services, such as project planning/scheduling, project feasibility study, financial planning, design management, quantity survey, design review, project budgeting, value engineering, architectural and engineering design, and green and sustainable design. Its project management/construction services also include engineering procurement and construction, construction management and supervision, project cost control, progress report presentation, and contact management; and claim and facility management, and quality inspection and deliver to site administration. In addition, the company provides technical services support; BIM objects creation, rendering and animation, construction simulation, software training, Web design application, IT and media solution, and events and presentations services; land management and development, residential property development, facility service and hospitality management, and construction project management services; and ?nancial advisory services. Further, it is involved in the repair, maintenance, and installation of power systems; provision of consultant services for energy efficient buildings, green building, and sustainable building projects; and provision of advisory for investment in information technology system and other investment, as well as services for trading, renting, leasing, exchanging, mortgage, and consignment related to real estate. The company was founded in 1987 and is headquartered in Bangkok, Thailand.

PPS.BK.long_name: Project Planning Service Public Company Limited
PPS.BK.summary: Project Planning Service Public Company Limited provides engineering and architectural services to the private and public sectors in Thailand and internationally. The company was founded in 1987 and is headquartered in Bangkok, Thailand.

PREB-R.BK.summary: Pre-Built Public Company Limited, together with its subsidiary, engages in the hire construction works in Thailand. It also manufactures and sells precast floor products; and develops and sells real estate properties, as well as engages in investment activities. The company was founded in 1995 and is headquartered in Nonthaburi, Thailand.

PREB.BK.summary: Pre-Built Public Company Limited, together with its subsidiary, engages in the hire construction works in Thailand. It also manufactures and sells precast floor products; and develops and sells real estate properties, as well as engages in investment activities. The company was founded in 1995 and is headquartered in Nonthaburi, Thailand.

PROS-R.BK.summary: Prosper Engineering Public Company Limited provides engineering systems, design, contractors, engineering consulting, and system maintenance services. The company offers civil and structural, architectural and interior, mechanical and electrical, renovation, and design and engineering works services; and electrical and communication, air conditioning and ventilation, and plumbing and fire protection system services. It operates and installs engineering systems in various types of buildings, which include shopping centers, superstores, product distribution centers, mobile telephone network centers, information centers, residential buildings, office buildings, government and public sector buildings, hospitals, and industrial factories. The company was founded in 1996 and is headquartered in Bangkok, Thailand.

PROS.BK.summary: Prosper Engineering Public Company Limited provides engineering systems, design, contractors, engineering consulting, and system maintenance services. The company offers civil and structural, architectural and interior, mechanical and electrical, renovation, and design and engineering works services; and electrical and communication, air conditioning and ventilation, and plumbing and fire protection system services. It operates and installs engineering systems in various types of buildings, which include shopping centers, superstores, product distribution centers, mobile telephone network centers, information centers, residential buildings, office buildings, government and public sector buildings, hospitals, and industrial factories. The company was founded in 1996 and is headquartered in Bangkok, Thailand.

PYLON-R.BK.summary: Pylon Public Company Limited, together with its subsidiaries, provides construction services in Thailand. It offers foundation services, including bored piles, ground improvement, diaphragm walls, and other construction services. The company also engages in the rental of machines, equipment, and tools. Pylon Public Company Limited was incorporated in 2002 and is headquartered in Bangkok, Thailand.

PYLON.BK.summary: Pylon Public Company Limited, together with its subsidiaries, provides construction services in Thailand. It offers foundation services, including bored piles, ground improvement, diaphragm walls, and other construction services. The company also engages in the rental of machines, equipment, and tools. Pylon Public Company Limited was incorporated in 2002 and is headquartered in Bangkok, Thailand.

RT-R.BK.summary: Right Tunnelling Public Company Limited engages in the provision of construction services, and underground rock and dam excavation, and other construction works in Thailand, Myanmar, the Lao People's Democratic Republic, and Cambodia. It is also involved in mineral exploration activities. The company was founded in 2000 and is based in Samutprakan, Thailand.

RT.BK.summary: Right Tunnelling Public Company Limited engages in the provision of construction services, and underground rock and dam excavation, and other construction works in Thailand, Myanmar, the Lao People's Democratic Republic, and Cambodia. It is also involved in mineral exploration activities. The company was founded in 2000 and is based in Samutprakan, Thailand.

SEAFCO-R.BK.summary: Seafco Public Company Limited, together with its subsidiaries, engages in the contractual construction of foundation and general public works in Thailand and internationally. It offers bored piling services, such as small and large diameter bored piling, auger drilling for bored piles, and drilling with bucket under slurries; rectangular, L shape, and T shape barrette piling services; and diaphragm walling services for deep basements, underpass tunnels, MRTA subway stations, and cut and cover tunnels. The company also undertakes substructure works, including foundation pile and diaphragm wall construction, temporary bracing installation, excavation, and construction of foundation mat and basement slabs. In addition, it engages in the civil construction of turnkey projects comprising underpass tunnels, fish marketplaces, and sports stadiums; and ground improvement works, such as soil improvement, deep mixing, and jet grouting for embankment foundations of highways, canals, river banks, tunnel openings, etc., as well as provision of vertical drain installation services. Further, the company offers ancillary services, including as sonic integrity test, drilling monitoring, pile load testing, and inclinometer monitoring, as well as rental services for movable and immovable assets. Seafco Public Company Limited was incorporated in 1974 and is headquartered in Bangkok, Thailand.

SEAFCO.BK.summary: Seafco Public Company Limited, together with its subsidiaries, engages in the contractual construction of foundation and general public works in Thailand and internationally. It offers bored piling services, such as small and large diameter bored piling, auger drilling for bored piles, and drilling with bucket under slurries; rectangular, L shape, and T shape barrette piling services; and diaphragm walling services for deep basements, underpass tunnels, MRTA subway stations, and cut and cover tunnels. The company also undertakes substructure works, including foundation pile and diaphragm wall construction, temporary bracing installation, excavation, and construction of foundation mat and basement slabs. In addition, it engages in the civil construction of turnkey projects comprising underpass tunnels, fish marketplaces, and sports stadiums; and ground improvement works, such as soil improvement, deep mixing, and jet grouting for embankment foundations of highways, canals, river banks, tunnel openings, etc., as well as provision of vertical drain installation services. Further, the company offers ancillary services, including as sonic integrity test, drilling monitoring, pile load testing, and inclinometer monitoring, as well as rental services for movable and immovable assets. Seafco Public Company Limited was incorporated in 1974 and is headquartered in Bangkok, Thailand.

SQ-R.BK.summary: Sahakol Equipment Public Company Limited provides overburden and lignite removal services in Thailand and the Lao People's Democratic Republic. The company offers coal removal and extraction services, as well as operates power plants; and soil and coal extraction, and removal services for the Electricity Generating Authority of Thailand. It also rents machinery; and offers machinery maintenance, and mining panning and consulting services. In addition, the company engages in civil engineering construction works; and utility systems construction works, such as roads, residences, etc. Sahakol Equipment Public Company Limited was founded in 2001 and is based in Bangkok, Thailand.

SQ.BK.summary: Sahakol Equipment Public Company Limited provides overburden and lignite removal services in Thailand and the Lao People's Democratic Republic. The company offers coal removal and extraction services, as well as operates power plants; and soil and coal extraction, and removal services for the Electricity Generating Authority of Thailand. It also rents machinery; and offers machinery maintenance, and mining panning and consulting services. In addition, the company engages in civil engineering construction works; and utility systems construction works, such as roads, residences, etc. Sahakol Equipment Public Company Limited was founded in 2001 and is based in Bangkok, Thailand.

SRICHA-R.BK.summary: Sriracha Construction Public Company Limited engages in construction and maintenance service businesses in Thailand and internationally. The company provides construction services in the areas of mechanical, welding, equipment and vessels, ducts, steel fabrication, shutdown, piping, turbine and generator, tanks, structural steel, pipe rack and buildings, piping work and installation, civil construction, permanent and temporary facilities, as well as sandblasting, grit blasting, and painting services. It also offers manpower supply agency services; and a range of maintenance services for power and petrochemical plants, oil refineries, industrial plants, etc., as well as rents construction equipment and tools. The company was formerly known as Sriracha Construction (1994) Co. Ltd and changed its name to Sriracha Construction Public Company Limited in December 2011. Sriracha Construction Public Company Limited was founded in 1994 and is headquartered in Si Racha, Thailand.

SRICHA.BK.summary: Sriracha Construction Public Company Limited engages in construction and maintenance service businesses in Thailand and internationally. It also offers manpower supply agency services; and a range of maintenance services for power and petrochemical plants, oil refineries, industrial plants, etc., as well as rents construction equipment and tools. The company was formerly known as Sriracha Construction (1994) Co. Ltd and changed its name to Sriracha Construction Public Company Limited in December 2011. Sriracha Construction Public Company Limited was founded in 1994 and is headquartered in Si Racha, Thailand.

STEC-R.BK.long_name: Sino-Thai Engineering and Construction Public Company Limited
STEC-R.BK.summary: Sino-Thai Engineering and Construction Public Company Limited, together with its subsidiaries, provides construction services in Thailand. It is involved in the construction of infrastructure development projects, including mass transit transportations, elevated roads, highways, roads, bridges, dams, jetty work, and other projects. The company also constructs industrial projects consisting of factories and chemical plants; building projects comprising office buildings, condominiums, housing projects, resorts, hangers, stadiums, convention centers, museums, hospitals, schools, and airport terminals; and power, gas, and energy projects, as well as environmental projects, such as oil wastewater treatment plants. In addition, it is involved in the rental of office buildings, machinery, and construction equipment; provision of document storage services; development of real estate projects; and electricity generation activities. The company was founded in 1962 and is based in Bangkok, Thailand.

STEC.BK.long_name: Sino-Thai Engineering and Construction Public Company Limited

In addition, it is involved in the rental of office buildings, machinery, and construction equipment; provision of document storage services; development of real estate projects; and electricity generation activities. The company was founded in 1962 and is based in Bangkok, Thailand.

STI-R.BK.summary: Stonehenge Inter Public Company Limited, together with its subsidiaries, provides consulting and construction management services in Thailand. It also offers architectural design and engineering services, and other services. The company was founded in 2004 and is headquartered in Bangkok, Thailand.

It also offers architectural design and engineering services, and other services. The company was founded in 2004 and is headquartered in Bangkok, Thailand.

SYNTEC-R.BK.summary: Syntec Construction Public Company Limited, together with its subsidiaries, engages in real estate development and construction activities in Thailand. The company undertakes residential, commercial, institutional, leisure, retail, industrial, and infrastructure projects. It is also involved in the real estate development for apartment service and rental; management of hotels, service apartments, and other properties; and procurement and installation of sanitation systems, electrical systems, and communications and air systems, as well as provision of consulting services. The company was formerly known as Siam Syntech Construction Public Company Limited and changed its name to Syntec Construction Public Company Limited in April 2004. Syntec Construction Public Company Limited was founded in 1988 and is based in Bangkok, Thailand.

SYNTEC.BK.summary: Syntec Construction Public Company Limited, together with its subsidiaries, engages in real estate development and construction activities in Thailand. The company undertakes residential, commercial, institutional, leisure, retail, industrial, and infrastructure projects. It is also involved in the real estate development for apartment service and rental; management of hotels, service apartments, and other properties; and procurement and installation of sanitation systems, electrical systems, and communications and air systems, as well as provision of consulting services. The company was formerly known as Siam Syntech Construction Public Company Limited and changed its name to Syntec Construction Public Company Limited in April 2004. Syntec Construction Public Company Limited was founded in 1988 and is based in Bangkok, Thailand.

T.BK.long_name: T Engineering Corporation Public Company Limited
T.BK.summary: T Engineering Corporation Public Company Limited engages in plant and building construction, and other related activities in Thailand. The company constructs industrial factories, steel-structure constructions, warehouses, condominiums, office buildings, shopping malls, hospitals, and petrochemical constructions. It also provides civil engineering services, such as civil works, reinforced concrete-structure works, steel-structure works, and architectural works, as well as installation of engineering systems, including electric, energy management, telecommunication, air conditioning, sanitation, and fire prevention systems. The company was formerly known as Thai Industrial and Engineering Service Public Company Limited and changed its name to T Engineering Corporation Public Company Limited in May 2017. The company was incorporated in 1981 and is headquartered in Bangkok, Thailand.

TAKUNI-R.BK.summary: Takuni Group Public Company Limited, together with its subsidiaries, provides construction services in Thailand. It operates through Liquid Petroleum Gas Trading; Gas Installation Equipment Trading; Transportation Services; Construction Services; Non-Destructive Testing and Inspection Services; and Others segments. The company offers petroleum gas trading for household cooking, industrial, and transportation sectors. It also provides industrial and car gas systems installation and equipment trading services. In addition, the company offers hazardous substances and construction materials transportation services by land; non-destructive testing and certify services under safety standards and regulations inspection services; and property development services. Further, it is involved in the industrial oil and gas piping system construction activities. The company was founded in 2007 and is headquartered in Bangkok, Thailand.

TAKUNI.BK.summary: Takuni Group Public Company Limited, together with its subsidiaries, provides construction services in Thailand. It operates through Liquid Petroleum Gas Trading; Gas Installation Equipment Trading; Transportation Services; Construction Services; Non-Destructive Testing and Inspection Services; and Others segments. The company offers petroleum gas trading for household cooking, industrial, and transportation sectors. It also provides industrial and car gas systems installation and equipment trading services. Further, it is involved in the industrial oil and gas piping system construction activities. The company was founded in 2007 and is headquartered in Bangkok, Thailand.

TEAMG-R.BK.long_name: TEAM Consulting Engineering and Management Public Company Limited
TEAMG-R.BK.summary: TEAM Consulting Engineering and Management Public Company Limited, together with its subsidiaries, provides integrated engineering, environment, and management consultancy services in Thailand and internationally. It also prepares environmental impact assessment reports. The company offers planning, design, study, and construction supervision and management services for mass rapid transit, railways, motorways/expressway, roads, bridges and overpasses, airports, and seaports, as well as traffic engineering and logistics management services. It also provides services related to basin-wide water resource management and development, irrigation, flood control and drainage, hydropower, coastal engineering, and water supply. In addition, the company offers research, planning, designing, project management, construction supervision, operation, and maintenance for building and infrastructure projects; and services related to environmental studies for various projects, such as water resource development, transportation systems, building and infrastructure, and clean energy, as well as wastewater, solid waste, and hazardous waste management projects. Further, it provides services related to power system development, oil and gas industry, fossil-fuel and renewable energy technology, energy conservation, and clean energy. Additionally, the company offers consulting services in the areas of strategic management, finance and investment, accounting, marketing, project management, and project development; geotechnical engineering, foundation, and underground structures; and power consumption, energy management system, energy measurement, and energy consumption monitoring and analysis for public and private sectors, as well as plans and designs building architecture, interior design, and landscape architecture. The company was incorporated in 1978 and is based in Bangkok, Thailand.

TEAMG.BK.long_name: TEAM Consulting Engineering and Management Public Company Limited
TEAMG.BK.summary: TEAM Consulting Engineering and Management Public Company Limited, together with its subsidiaries, provides integrated engineering, environment, and management consultancy services in Thailand and internationally. It also prepares environmental impact assessment reports. The company offers planning, design, study, and construction supervision and management services for mass rapid transit, railways, motorways/expressway, roads, bridges and overpasses, airports, and seaports, as well as traffic engineering and logistics management services. Further, it provides services related to power system development, oil and gas industry, fossil-fuel and renewable energy technology, energy conservation, and clean energy. Additionally, the company offers consulting services in the areas of strategic management, finance and investment, accounting, marketing, project management, and project development; geotechnical engineering, foundation, and underground structures; and power consumption, energy management system, energy measurement, and energy consumption monitoring and analysis for public and private sectors, as well as plans and designs building architecture, interior design, and landscape architecture. The company was incorporated in 1978 and is based in Bangkok, Thailand.

TIGER-R.BK.long_name: Thai Enger Holding Public Company Limited
TIGER-R.BK.summary: Thai Enger Holding Public Company Limited, through its subsidiaries, engages in construction and interior service business. It is also involved in the business of aluminum installation and sale of construction materials. The company was incorporated in 2016 and is based in Bang Kruai, Thailand.

TIGER.BK.long_name: Thai Enger Holding Public Company Limited
TIGER.BK.summary: Thai Enger Holding Public Company Limited, through its subsidiaries, engages in construction and interior service business. It is also involved in the business of aluminum installation and sale of construction materials. The company was incorporated in 2016 and is based in Bang Kruai, Thailand.

TNDT-R.BK.long_name: Thai Nondestructive Testing Public Company Limited
TNDT-R.BK.summary: Thai Nondestructive Testing Public Company Limited, a technical service company, provides nondestructive engineering services in Thailand. It operates through two segments, Nondestructive Testing Services, and Inspection Services for Pressure Vessel and Others. The company offers a range of conventional inspection services, including ultrasonic, radiography, eddy current, magnetic particle, liquid penetrant, positive material identification, and visual services. It also provides advance nondestructive testing technology and inspection techniques, such as above ground storage tank program, pipeline radiography, small controlled area radiography, remote visual inspection, positive material identification, and liquid pressure test packs. In addition, the company engages in the rendering excavation and transportation services of coal for the coal mine concessionaire; generation and sale of electricity from coal-fired thermal power; and procurement and servicing of public utility systems and other related businesses, as well as offers advisory services for engineering. Further, it provides engineering inspection and nondestructive testing of pressure vessels, heat exchangers, boilers, piping, and structures in the fields of oil refinery, power plant, petrochemical plant, ship building, offshore, bridge and building construction, and other various heavy industries. The company was founded in 1982 and is headquartered in Bangkok, Thailand.

TNDT.BK.long_name: Thai Nondestructive Testing Public Company Limited
TNDT.BK.summary: Thai Nondestructive Testing Public Company Limited, a technical service company, provides nondestructive engineering services in Thailand. TPOLY-R.BK.summary: Thai Polycons Public Company Limited, together with its subsidiaries, provides construction services in Thailand. It undertakes construction of building, commercial building, power plant, infrastructure, hospital, and residential building projects. The company also engages in the property development activities; trading business; and production and trading of electricity. In addition, it invests in energy business. The company was founded in 1988 and is headquartered in Bangkok, Thailand.

TPOLY.BK.summary: Thai Polycons Public Company Limited, together with its subsidiaries, provides construction services in Thailand. It undertakes construction of building, commercial building, power plant, infrastructure, hospital, and residential building projects. The company also engages in the property development activities; trading business; and production and trading of electricity. In addition, it invests in energy business. The company was founded in 1988 and is headquartered in Bangkok, Thailand.

TRC.BK.summary: TRC Construction Public Company Limited provides construction services in Thailand. The company operates through four segments: Pipeline System Construction, Engineering System, Civil Work Construction, and Sales and Other Services. It primarily provides engineering design, procurement, construction, and construction management services. The company also engages in pipeline system construction, engineering system installation, and factory construction in energy and petrochemical industries, as well as project development and investment business in energy, real estate, power plant, and petrochemical sectors. In addition, it constructs roads, water systems, bridge, wastewater treatment system, dam, water distribution system, railway, water supply, and airport facilities, as well as other infrastructure; underground electrical conduits, including boring and pipe jacking work; and produces and distributes tap water, as well as offers data management and processing services. The company was incorporated in 1998 and is headquartered in Bangkok, Thailand.

TRITN-R.BK.summary: Triton Holding Public Company Limited, an investment holding company, engages in the construction and engineering business in Thailand. The company operates through two segments, Constructions Business, and Electricity and Energy Business. It constructs non-residential buildings; and provides land and building rental services. The company also engages in the mining and construction material supply; electricity generation from solar, wind, hydro, biogas, and waste; waste management; sale of radio taps and radio compact discs; and alternative energy resource and mining businesses. In addition, it is involved in provision of directional drilling contract business, which performs works of oil, water, sewer, and gas pipelines, as well as fiber optic cables; management of real estate; film production and distribution; showcasing; radio business; and production of TV programs for pay TV businesses. The company was formerly known as Live Incorporation Public Company Limited and changed its name to Triton Holding Public Company Limited in October 2015. Triton Holding Public Company Limited was founded in 1987 and is headquartered in Bangkok, Thailand.

TRITN.BK.summary: Triton Holding Public Company Limited, an investment holding company, engages in the construction and engineering business in Thailand. The company operates through two segments, Constructions Business, and Electricity and Energy Business. It constructs non-residential buildings; and provides land and building rental services. The company was formerly known as Live Incorporation Public Company Limited and changed its name to Triton Holding Public Company Limited in October 2015. Triton Holding Public Company Limited was founded in 1987 and is headquartered in Bangkok, Thailand.

TTCL-R.BK.summary: TTCL Public Company Limited, together with its subsidiaries, designs, procures, and constructs integrated industrial factories in Thailand and internationally. The company operates through three segments, Energy Business, Construction Business, and Manufacturing and Distribution of White Pallets. It offers engineering design services for civil structures and utility systems, such as electricity, water, air conditioning, solid and wastewater treatment systems, storage tanks, production processes, and petrochemical and chemical plants, as well as procurement of machinery and equipment, and plant construction. The company also generates and sells electricity to the government through natural gas-fired power plants and solar power plants, as well as invests and develops renewable energy power plants and invests in energy business. In addition, TTCL Public Company Limited offers conceptual study, pre-feasibility study, and detailed feasibility study services. The company was formerly known as Toyo-Thai Corporation Public Company Limited and changed its name to TTCL Public Company Limited in April 2015. TTCL Public Company Limited was incorporated in 1985 and is headquartered in Bangkok, Thailand.

UNIQ-R.BK.long_name: Unique Engineering and Construction Public Company Limited
UNIQ-R.BK.summary: Unique Engineering and Construction Public Company Limited, together with its subsidiaries, engages in the construction contracting and real estate development businesses in Thailand. Its projects include steel bridges, reinforced concrete bridges, tunnel beneath the intersections, concrete-surfaced or asphaltic concrete roads, public utility works, structural works, building works, dam and retaining walls, etc. The company also leases service machinery; manufactures construction materials; sells sand; produces concrete ready mix and precast concrete; and offers steel fabrication, assembly and survey, and repair and maintenance services for machinery and equipment. In addition, it is involved in the service of infrastructure and systems. The company primarily serves government agencies. Unique Engineering and Construction Public Company Limited was founded in 1994 and is based in Nonthaburi, Thailand.

UNIQ.BK.long_name: Unique Engineering and Construction Public Company Limited
UNIQ.BK.summary: Unique Engineering and Construction Public Company Limited, together with its subsidiaries, engages in the construction contracting and real estate development businesses in Thailand. Its projects include steel bridges, reinforced concrete bridges, tunnel beneath the intersections, concrete-surfaced or asphaltic concrete roads, public utility works, structural works, building works, dam and retaining walls, etc. The company also leases service machinery; manufactures construction materials; sells sand; produces concrete ready mix and precast concrete; and offers steel fabrication, assembly and survey, and repair and maintenance services for machinery and equipment. In addition, it is involved in the service of infrastructure and systems. The company primarily serves government agencies. Unique Engineering and Construction Public Company Limited was founded in 1994 and is based in Nonthaburi, Thailand.

WGE-R.BK.long_name: Well Graded Engineering Public Company Limited
WGE-R.BK.summary: Well Graded Engineering Public Company Limited operates as a construction contractor in Thailand. It provides turnkey commercial and residential construction services, as well as related technical consultancy services for engineering and architecture sectors. It also offers after sales service, including warranties and claims, and maintenance to its customers. The company was incorporated in 2010 and is headquartered in Nonthaburi, Thailand.
